o When ■ & first arrived at JE's house, they walked into the kitchen 
where there was a chef cooking, who asked if wanted food. Then Maxwell 
approached. U believes Maxwell's first name may have been "Giselle" or 
"Gisine," but she is not certain. • is certain her last name was Maxwell, and 
referred to her as Maxwell. • does not know how to pronounce Maxwell's 
first name. 
■ 
Maxwell was an older lady with black hair, about shoulder length. 
Maxwell appeared to be in her 40s. Maxwell had an accent, which 
recalls seeming like a mix of French and Australian. 
■ 
introduced to Maxwell as my friend 
■ 
Maxwell told in presence that Jeffrey will be back soon and 
that should take upstairs and show her what to do. 
and then went upstairs into Jeffrey's bedroom, past his bed into his 
bathroom. 
■ 
When walked into the bathroom, she saw the sink to the right, shower 
and steamroom in front, toilet to the left, and ugly polka dot couch to the 
left. U recalls seeing a bunch of naked pictures of different women in 
the closet handing on the wall and the massage table. 
■ 
MI believes that the clock in the bathroom had a camera in it. MI also 
believes that the house across the street from JE's house had the FBI in it 
because she saw a telescope in one of the windows. • acknowledged 
that no one ever told her there was a camera in the clock or that the FBI 
was across the street. never saw the camera itself or the FBI across 
the street. U indicated that she gets feelings like premonitions and 
believes strongly that the camera had a clock and the building across the 
street had the FBI in it. 
showed how to set up the massage table, where the oils and lotions 
were. Lotions were in the dresser to left as walked into the bathroom. •

got fully naked. ■ got into her bra and underwear.

got 
$600.. recalls the 
cash being in 20s and 100s.

o 
When and ■ went downstairs, Maxwell asked ■ for her number so 
could massage JE again. • gave Maxwell her cellphone number. • saw 
Maxwell write the phone number down in a black book. 
• • provided over 100 paid sexualized massages to JE after that first time. About 2 or 3 
times per week. Stopped massaging JE when was about 18, almost 19 years old. 
Around that time, JE asked if she knew anyone younger she could bring. • figured 
she was too old at that point. 
o The details of each massage run together in memory, but certain events 
stand out more than others. 
o 
• 
would get to JE's house by taking cabs that JE would pay for, or 
would drive in mom's car. 
o To schedule massages, either Maxwell or would call M. Sometimes • 
called herself to ask if she could schedule a massage when she ran out of money 
for drugs. 
■

going over to JE's house, after which became the person who called. 
■ 
was an assistant who was younger than Maxwell with light brown 
hair

After Maxwell stopped calling to schedule appointments, U would still

area

Maxwell and would call cellphone, mom's cellphone, 
and phone number to schedule U for massages

At one point, Maxwell asked U if she could call U back on the number

Maxwell put that number in the black book. 
■ 
When someone would call mom, her mom would tell that a

■ 
When someone would call phone, he would give the 
phone and tell her to schedule an appointment 
■ 
When Maxwell would call, she would ask U if she could come over at a

■ 
A couple times, Maxwell told that Maxwell and Epstein were in New 
York and that she and Epstein and would be coming back to Palm 
Beach. U estimates this happened about ten to twelve times. U recalls 
that Maxwell was calling from a Manhattan area code during those calls. 
■ 
Other times, when Maxwell would say she was calling from Florida, the 
calls came from a Palm Beach area code. 
■ 
When would call, she would ask ifU would be available to come 
to Palm Beach at a particular time

■ 
• would reach out to schedule appointments herself because she was

■

needed 
money. 
o 
When didn't drive 
f,

either they'd pay for the cab or would send a car for her. 
■ 
would borrow mom's car to drive U sometimes. 
■ 
was too young to get her license so couldn't legally drive herself, but 
she nevertheless drove herself to JE's house in her mom's car once or 
twice. 
never went inside JE's house. met JE once or twice. • recalls 
talking with JE about the cars JE owned. 
o never entered JE's house through the front door, always entered through the 
door that led into the kitchen. Once inside, would usually see Maxwell and 
the chef. Once or twice, saw the housekeeper and his wife, but they were 
only at JE's house for the beginning of time going to JE's house, then they 
left. 
■ 
Maxwell would offer food or water, and would wait for JE 
■ 
Maxwell engaged in conversation sometimes. Maxwell asked if

alcoholic. Maxwell asked if anything bad had ever happened to

■ 
Maxwell told that JE would pay for to go to massage school, but 
told Maxwell that was too young. That same appointment, JE 
gave with a book called Massage for Dummies. 
■ 
Maxwell asked if she'd like to go to an island that JE owned. •

Maxwell acted like she didn't hear and said ok then walked back into

after told Maxwell her age.

o After going into the kitchen for each massage, E went upstairs into JE's 
bathroom, put the massage table together, then got undressed. 
• At first, U just got into her bra and underwear. 
• Later on, U would get fully nude and put her clothes on the couch. JE 
offered to pay U an extra $100 if she would take off her bra, and an extra 
$100 if she would take off her underwear. 
o Maxwell saw El nude in the massage room about two times when U was about 
15 years old. 
• First time, Maxwell just looked at U and said U had a nice body 
• Second time, Maxwell fondled U breasts and touched buttocks and 
said U had a nice body for Mr. Epstein's friends. U recalls feeling 
weird about this because JE wouldn't touch U the way that Maxwell did. 
JE would touch breasts and bottom, but not the way that Maxwell 
did. U also felt weird because Maxwell was talking about other people. 
• After Maxwell saw U nude in the massage room, Maxwell called U to 
schedule additional massage appointments about a couple more times 
o 
came into the massage room and saw U naked in the room a couple times. 
also took naked photos of E. 
• called El and said JE would like to take pictures of E. 
would be the one taking pictures, and U could bring a bathing suit. U

photos. 
took the photos inside and outside on JE's property.

o During massage appointments, JE would come in, U would first massage JE for 
about 45 minutes, then JE would turn over. 
• A couple times, U got into the steamroom with JE. 
o During the massage portion, JE would engage in conversation. 
• JE asked about family life, things had been through, and what 
U wanted to do with her life. JE asked about family, and she told 
him she lived with her mom and her mom is a drug addict and an 
alcoholic. JE asked if U had ever been to a massage shop, and U said 
no. E told JE 
• JE asked if El was willing to go to Paris, and U told JE she was 14 
years old and her mom would never let her go on a trip. JE also invited 
U to his house on the island, but U said her mom wouldn't let her. JE 
asked U if she could get a passport, and U said she was 15 and her 
mom would not allow her to travel. 
• JE told U that had gone to Thailand. El does not remember JE 
telling U anything about travel with

about

remembers being paid $200 extra when she brought a friend, so

was
